body_html:
Not a bug. In 0.4 we introduced scalars, and thus [] becomes dim 1, which is the more reasonable behavior than in 0.3.1. Note that it isn't empty, but it is of size (0,). An empty tensor should be of size ().

See https://pytorch.org/2018/04/22/0_4_0-migration-guide.html
body_text:
Not a bug. In 0.4 we introduced scalars, and thus [] becomes dim 1, which is the more reasonable behavior than in 0.3.1. Note that it isn't empty, but it is of size (0,). An empty tensor should be of size ().
See https://pytorch.org/2018/04/22/0_4_0-migration-guide.html
body:
Not a bug. In 0.4 we introduced scalars, and thus `[]` becomes dim 1, which is the more reasonable behavior than in 0.3.1. Note that it isn't empty, but it is of size `(0,)`. An empty tensor should be of size `()`.

See https://pytorch.org/2018/04/22/0_4_0-migration-guide.html
